page.title: 15WHERE WE LIVE
page.content:
We interviewed all the 74 children who were in school on 24 july 1985.We wanted to discover where they all lived.We divided the area into four districts as follows:
1 The new private estate(begun1979) 2 Chancery Close(council houses) built five years ago. 3 Other houses in the village. 4 Houses outside the village.
We discovered that: 1 Twenty one lived in catagory 1. 2 Twenty two lived in catagory 2. 3 Twenty three lived in catagory 3. 4 Eight lived in catagory 4. We think there will soon be many more in catagory 1 because there are more than thirty children in play group and most of them live on the new estate.
